level.text: 2921.1 The Office of Zoning shall refer the application to the Office oflanning, the District Department of Transportation, Fire and Emergencyervices, the District Department of the Environment, and any other relevantistrict agencies for review and comment.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4804 (June 3,011).
